q: Eagles' Michael Vick , Ben Roethlisberger might be the toughest quarterback to sack, said Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis. "He's very strong. He's very elusive in the pocket," Ellis said. A lot of people don't realize how fast he is.... I know he looks slow moving around on the field, but he's pretty nifty at what he does. If those cases are confirmed as suicides- and officials said they usually are- that rate would be higher than the 16 combat deaths reported last month in Iraq and Afghanistan. The trend and trajectory seen in January further heightens the seriousness and urgency that all of us must have in preventing suicides, Army Vice Chief of Staff Colin Powell Peter Chiarelli said. Army brass said they would hold suicide prevention training for all soldiers from Feb. 15 to March 15. Veterans advocates said the new figures were "staggering" but also
